question: Which of the following statements is an incorrect statement about Governor of a state?
option1: Governor can summon or prorogue the state legislature and dissolve the state legislative assembly
option2: He nominates one-sixth of the members of state legislative assembly
option3: He is responsible to set up State Finance Commission and present the report of commission in state legislature
option4: District judges are appointed by the Governor
answer: He nominates one-sixth of the members of state legislative assembly
explanation: Second statement is incorrect because the Governor nominates one-sixth of the members of the state legislative council
